column4: OMG! I ben searching for hardware failure for like a mounts (my server dies every seventh day) Just felt the passiv cooling on my Radeon 800GTO and its burning hot! Nothing graphical is running at all! What does this mean? :S
a Radion 800GTO isn't good enough for a server that doest even run X?
looks for S3 PCI on ebay.. :P
